website_summaries.verdict: This model allows you to add heat to your current toilet seat.
pros: Can be used with padded toilet seats
Good customer service from the company
Low price option for a heated toilet seat
cons: If the lid is not put back down, the toilet seat does not tend to stay warm

customer_reviews.title: Possible fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: Attaches to the seat cover with adhesive tabs, hard to clean around, and cord only comes out of the right side. After six months of warming my husband's toilet seat, it has scorch marks coming through the outer layer (only using low setting), burning and melting the plastic on the outside. I fear a fire started by the components inside.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Crews

customer_reviews.title: I love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the lamest gift ever, when I opened it Christmas day. My husband installed it, and OMG!!! it is wonderful. No more cold seats for me. I love this, especially in the winter. Might be the greatest gift ever.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah L. Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Make your TUSHY happy!
customer_reviews.text: Give the inventor the Nobel Prize oh my God my TUSHY has never been so happy literally!!! It has velcro tab so you can attach it to the bottom of the toilet lid it has velcros for the extension cords to hang the remote controller that's wired and it will stay on all the time so you don't have to worry about timers and a cold seat when you wake up late night an early mornings when my bathroom is frozen especially my toilet seat this is been the Best Buy I've ever had ever!
customer_reviews.author: B. Sepulveda

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your buns warm!
customer_reviews.text: When my husband said he didnt want to use the downstairs toilet because it was too cold I went in search of a solution. I never expected to find a product like this and I absolutely love it! We keep ours on the low setting and it is perfect. The only trouble is reminding my hubby that it wont work unless he puts the seat down! If you hate a cold toilet seat this is the perfect product for you. In our bathroom we have an outlet right above the toilet so it was very convenient to be able to plug the Toastie Tushie in.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Had one for 2 years till it finally scared us with a cold seat. We have it set up on a smart plug to be on whenever we are home so the seat is always warm. Life long customer here.
customer_reviews.author: juan manuel hernandez jr

customer_reviews.title: Where is Amazon to help with there supported-site-sellers who abandon ...
customer_reviews.text: Where is Amazon to help with there supported-site-sellers who abandon the buyer? When it worked it was just want I wanted until it stopped working. The controller has apparently failed. It blows circuit breakers. Has no control over heat level. Have tried to contact seller for months but only get answering machine and no call back. There is no customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T.

customer_reviews.title: No more cold tush.
customer_reviews.text: I love this device. I had to teach my guy to put the toilet lid down as the heater attaches to the bottom of the lid, but after about a month of toilet training he learned. I would just be sure to place my cold rear on him when I returned from the bathroom. The heater is adjustable so during the summer I turn it to low, but in the winter the high setting is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Powell

customer_reviews.title: Staining on Padded Vinyl Toilet Seat
customer_reviews.text: I loved this seat warmer when I first received it, however, I installed it on a padded vinyl toilet seat. About 2 months into the install date, the padded seat started to stain due to the heat. I'm going to replace the seat with a wood or plastic seat and will continue to use the seat warmer but if you're a major fan of padded vinyl seats, this may not be the seat warmer for you.
customer_reviews.author: Michele M.

customer_reviews.title: Scared of bidets
customer_reviews.text: This is the first seat-heating contraption I could find that didn't come as a bidet (they terrify me). It was easy to install and makes going to the bathroom in freezing temperatures almost enticing. The design isn't the most attractive though, which is why I took out a star. I wouldn't put one in my guest bathroom for that reason, but it's tolerable in my hidden master bath. Priorities. I've used it for a week and will update if it goes awry.
customer_reviews.author: Bones1971

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, does not work. I had it heating on the highest setting on the seat for an hour and my seat was still cold. It's basically just a very very cheaply made toilet seat shaped heating pad. The cord is obnoxious and very noticeable. I had it on a nice toilet and would be embarrassed for anyone to see it velcrowed to the lid with a giant wire hanging down the side. Should have went with my gut and just bought an actual heated seat.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Been using this item for  years
customer_reviews.text: My last one died after using it every winter for 8 or 9 years. I am not willing to live without a warm seat when the bathroom is so cold so I had to buy another one. I was shocked at how much higher the price was. While I didn't like that, I bought it anyway and am hoping it will last at least as long the last one. I highly recommend having something to warm our "tushy".
customer_reviews.author: LOM

customer_reviews.title: Love it but had to replace after just 7 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this heater and bought it because of cold sensitivity due to chemotherapy. However, I purchased it in January and now (August) have already had to replace it. The problem is electrical; it either blows its fuses or somehow the electrical stops working. Have tried resetting, unplugging and replugging, adjusting controls -- nothing works. However, I'm buying another because I prefer this design to one that people actually sit upon with all the cleaning potential that involves. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: No more frost bitten tushy!
customer_reviews.text: We keep the BR temp low for more comfortable sleep, but my wife’s nightly bathroom visits were usually accompanied by a yelp of discomfort when she landed on the cold seat! No more - she laughed when she opened this as a present on Christmas morning, but has been super appreciative every day since 👍
customer_reviews.author: Gryphon Slayer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I've had this less than a year and since it has only been used in winter, and in a vacation home, I am greatly disappointed that it no longer works. The temperature regulation has stopped functioning and stays on HOT HOT HOT. Don't waste $$.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy M

customer_reviews.title: May seem like a frivolous expense but is really a money saver in disguise.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate sitting on a cold toilet seat. It is one of the few things I hate more than spending money. However, after buying this simple to install heating pad, my heating bill went down by almost as much as this cost in just one month, because I dropped the thermostat 10 degrees and didn't mind at all. I only wish it had an additional option to the velcro, maybe clips of some sort for the 9 months of the year I do not need it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this thing there were nights I would literally scream as sat on toilet from the cold add in stiff sore joints and sitting could become extrodinarely painful. The only thing is to remember to close the kid so it can warm the seat but over all a wonderful thing
customer_reviews.author: Ms Tony T

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this product. My family still comments on it - even after having it for a week. It performs exactly as advertised. The vendor even contacted me prior to purchase to make sure I was aware that this wasn't an actual toilet seat and recommended I retract my order if that was what I was looking for. It keeps the seat at a perfect temperature. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because the hooks they sent to hold the cord will not stick to anything. It wasn't an issue for us and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny if you live in a cold weather area!!
customer_reviews.text: My sister has a heated toilet seat. It cost her well over a hundred dollars. I saw this, and said why not. It's a heating pad for your seat. It works AWESOME!! Half the price of a heated seat, (which felt odd to me, when sitting on it, like the width was too small) and as easy as applying velcro tape to install!
customer_reviews.author: Book reader

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My first one broke within a couple of months of use, I was out of luck for an Amazon warranty but the manufacturer sent me a new one (they are a little hard to get a hold of, I will say that.) The new one I can tell is improved and hasn't been giving me the electrical problems the first one did, it's good to see a manufacturer improving their product. This thing is amazing, it works great and is easy to install (I never attached mine to my lid and it works just as well).
customer_reviews.author: Aisha F

customer_reviews.title: Makes it a pleasure to do your business on a cold morning!
customer_reviews.text: Up here in Alaska it gets darn cold. Last winter we had two days colder than 45 below, another half-dozen colder than 35 below, and a month on each side of that at 20 below and colder. What a blessing to sit down a nice warm toilet seat. Worth every penny, going to purchase another one just for backup.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome invention at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most awesome invention. It's so nice to not sit down on a cold toilet seat in the winter time. The only drawback is you have to remember to put the top of the toilet seat down when you're done or it won't warm up the seat. It just takes a little getting used to. The price was better than some of the other similar products and easier to set up. We did unplug it for the summer time since we live in southern California. My husband & I both live it!
customer_reviews.author: nutmeg

customer_reviews.title: No More Icey Toilet Seat
customer_reviews.text: Just got done using this for the 3rd winter, love it. So nice to sit on a nice warm seat, especially in the middle of the night, when you don't want to wake up more than you have to.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.

customer_reviews.title: Essential butt warmer for cold days
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for cold weather city like mine. I prefer this over the cloth any day. And it doesn’t eat your electricity that much either so. You will definitely love it, especially when you are going in the middle of the night when it was cold haha. cannot go wrong with is butt warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Alan MZ Lee

customer_reviews.title: ThE BEST
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life??? Hate those cold seats. This is lovely, you adjust how warm. I'll never live without one again!!!
customer_reviews.author: patti

customer_reviews.title: Tripping hazard for elderly
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased for my elderly mother who is afraid to sit on the toilet. The problem we had with it was the cord which would have to have been strapped under the door there by creating a tripping hazard for her. We never used the toasty tush. It was returned shortly after realizing that it was not a battery operated device
customer_reviews.author: J. LEAL

customer_reviews.title: Toasty Tushy, oh Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product to keep the toilet seat warm. This is my 2nd one. Had to purchase this one because I went from a round toilet seat to an elongated one
customer_reviews.author: Tamera Simonson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my outhouse at the cabin for the wife turns out I love it to. Had to put a piece of foam insulation under the seat to much cold air coming up threw for it to work otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hot Product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the ToastieTush for my parents as an early Christmas present. They curtain off part of their home to keep the heat in the kitchen/living room area; it saves energy but leaves sitting in the bathroom an 'exhilarating' experience. They installed the ToastieTush this week and have expressed non stop gratitude ever since. It was easy to install, has temperature settings so it can be adjusted to personal preference, and has made the long NH winters a bit more bearable. I received a friendly hello email shortly after ordering, and the package arrived in record time. A pleasant experience for giver and receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy D.

customer_reviews.title: Flat lids only
customer_reviews.text: This will only work with flat toilet seat lids. The stops must be removable. If you mount this on a lid with non-removable stops the heating pad will not rest on the toilet seat. Both of my toilet seat lids are not flat and have molded in stops. There is no way this heating pad would contact the seat if mounted per the instructions. Otherwise this seems to be as listed. I returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present for a family member. Easy to install and works great! Now said family member doesn't want to get off of the toilet, lol!!
customer_reviews.author: awesome a

customer_reviews.title: I AM NOW SPOILED!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing EVER! My biggest pet peeve is cold toilet seats and this takes care of it. This past winter was sooo nice due to me not having to plunk down on a cold seat. I dreaded using the bathroom anywhere else because I knew the seat was going to be cold. Get yours today and keep your seat warm. :)
customer_reviews.author: Y.I. Read

customer_reviews.title: bad idea, bad execution,overpriced
customer_reviews.text: extreme bad deal, first 2 settings do nada next one will give you a 2nd degree burn. and way way over priced for what came I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: real talk

customer_reviews.title: Nothing BUTT aaaaaahhhhh. pun intened.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one 4 years ago and still is great. Just bought one for my Sister, all we can say is aaahhhhhhh. Add some extra Velcro to bond it to the cover as I saw another buyer said and after 4 years no issues pulling away from lid. Low setting is plenty for us.
customer_reviews.author: BIPE

customer_reviews.title: This is an AMAZING product. It warms the toilet seat when you ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an AMAZING product. It warms the toilet seat when you have a bathroom that is colder than an igloo at the South Pole. I did not velcro it to the seat as I don't need it in the summer. But it will stand up and, in addition to warming your tush, warms your back too. Easy to install and use. Better than ti ones costing from $100 to $900 I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great Little pricey
customer_reviews.text: It works great I just think the price is a little high for what it is. \ I think at $45 or so they would sell more. The star is because of the price
customer_reviews.author: Jim & Dee

customer_reviews.title: A household must buy!! You can't go wrong here especially if you live in the colder states!
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I buy this earlier! I'm in heaven I sit on this! It has become a family favorite! Seriously the best housing warming gift you can give someone. They have excellent customer service and will take care of any needs you have. You have that extra peace of mind when it come to purchasing this, so don't hesitate because your bum wants this!!
customer_reviews.author: CaliTristansmom

customer_reviews.title: Elderly Mother Loves This!
customer_reviews.text: Elderly (83) mother lives in a wooded area, she only heats her bedroom, not the bathroom. This toilet warmer has made all the difference in the world to her. She keeps it on the highest setting and LOVES it! The 7' cord reaches around her bathroom vanity and we have it plugged into a gfi, so we're not worried about it overheating. We highly recommend this item. She's been using it about a month and is still raving about what a difference it makes for her.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Z. Igno

customer_reviews.title: VERY UNHAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I INSTALLED THIS ITEM AND THERE IS NO HEAT!! I NEEDS A RETURN TAG FOR A REFUND
customer_reviews.author: Dave Noyes

customer_reviews.title: Life changing.
customer_reviews.text: I'm pregnant, and have to get up like 5 times a night to go to the bathroom. We also live in a basement in an area where it's gotten up to -20 degrees this winter. This keeps my bottom comfy and I will never go without one again.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Did stay on properply. Broke within two months. I purchased on for myself in 2015 and one was gifted to me. Both broke within the same period. Will just be spending more money for something else more realiable.
customer_reviews.author: Loki of Jotunheim

customer_reviews.title: Warm tushie
customer_reviews.text: We love in the PNW, it’s always cold. My wife loves this because the house stays cold and this keeps the toilet seat warm!!
customer_reviews.author: Heston Killip

customer_reviews.title: Warm Buns! BUTT! beware! make sure you have another toilet to use because she will be on hers always.
customer_reviews.text: Do You want to make Her happy? Get her the 'Toasty Tush'!! From Toastie Tush (Round) - Innovative Toilet Seat... Ella-mentary Products, LLC
customer_reviews.author: charles mcrunnels

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like a warm toilet seat in the winter.
customer_reviews.text: Gave it away as a gift for Xmas. Lasted two weeks and quit heating. I would have exchanged it but they didn't offer exchanges. Just a refund. I'm guessing because the price went up $10.00 since I purchased it. It's a great item. I owned one and loved it. Nothing like a warm toilet seat in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Doug B.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: It was the only heated toilet seat that I could make work on my RV toilet so I found it most acceptable
customer_reviews.author: Big Bill

customer_reviews.title: Warmth in halves..
customer_reviews.text: Product won't function to its full capability if the actual toilet seat is larger than the toilet seat lid the product is attached to. You end up with a warm seat but the rim of the seat doesn't warm up so you end up with colder edges. Although this can feel a bit weird, overall it's still an improvement on freezing your entire butt off. Mind you I have a wooden toilet seat, so it may respond differently to toilet seats made from more heat absorbing materials.
customer_reviews.author: The honest one

customer_reviews.title: toasty ass warmer.
customer_reviews.text: it beats sitting on a cold toilet seat,the warmer the better.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Haarmann   this is me

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have gotten and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: jreaneau

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Warm and toasty, Toastie Tush makes for comfy mornings. Easy to install. Easy to use. Wish I had discovered it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: HKSac

customer_reviews.title: Toastie
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sister who lives in Washington State and she had towels on her toilet lol. I just had to do this for her. She texts me all the time now to let me how much she loves it. It's like a heating pad for your bottom.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: HeatingPad
customer_reviews.text: Go to Wal-Mart buy a heating pad !!!! Save Money !!!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis D.

customer_reviews.title: Half the price of the UltraTouch Heated Toilet Seat
customer_reviews.text: This WORKS! I have an old house and the bathroom is not only poorly insulated, but the toilet is right next to a window. Having to pee on those cold winter nights felt like a physical assault. Last winter I got the UltraTouch Heated Toilet Seat, but the heating mechanism was beginning to fail. I didn't want to shell out another 80 bucks, so I tried this. At the highest setting it's really warm. I'm actually turning it down and trying the lower settings. YAY! One year later and still wonderful. Everyone who visits loves it. AND my cat loves it too: She sleeps on the lid every night during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Scott in Rhode Island

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS!!! I have a $300 heated toilet seat in my one bathroom and just didn't want to spend that much in my 2nd bathroom. This did the trick! Easy install, easy to clean and wow, does that seat get toastie!!! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Toastie for my Tush
customer_reviews.text: WONDERFUL PRODUCT, but make sure you have an electrical outlet on the same wall as the toilet. If your plug is across from the toilet the cord gets in the way and having to unplug it to take a shower so you don't light up.
customer_reviews.author: WGP

customer_reviews.title: I hate the cold weather and although I live in Georgia ...
customer_reviews.text: I hate the cold weather and although I live in Georgia getting up in the middle of the night to "go" really woke me up! Problem solved! Love It!!
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Sitting on our seat was like sitting on a block of ice
customer_reviews.text: My 97 year old mother wanted us to buy something to warm the toilet seat for her. Sitting on our seat was like sitting on a block of ice, she said. In the winter I agreed. She died a year later and my wife got rid of the seat warmer. My son and I sure do miss that seat warmer in the winter. The price was worth it too.
customer_reviews.author: Doug B.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They would leave the seat cover up all the time. Had to remove it
customer_reviews.author: Keith Wright

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about a week or so
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about a week or so. But the GFCI plug popped and the plug fell apart. I've installed a new one and its working again
customer_reviews.author: 6C Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Hid In The Lid
customer_reviews.text: Toasty Tush was a warm surprise at my local coffee salon, S.U.B.A., in Victor, Idaho. I liked it so much that I bought three (two for my brother-in-laws). Toasty Tush warms the toilet seat with an electrically heated pad (plugged into a wall outlet) that adheres to the inside of the toilet lid. When the lid is closed the seat is heating. When one sits, the seat is hot enough to seem sanitary, not just warm, as if someone else had recently been there. I like Toasty Tush. It's easy to wipe clean and has an unexpectedly comforting effect.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Harrison

customer_reviews.title: My wife wanted a heated toilet seat for a while ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a heated toilet seat for a while, but I didn't think they existed until I searched. This was priced fairly & my wife loves it. Going strong now for almost 2 years
customer_reviews.author: Woodsman

customer_reviews.title: Warms my buns
customer_reviews.text: This was actually for Mrs. James - I have always hated to sit on a cold toilet in the winter time and decided to do something about it. Well lo and behold, the toastie tush - this thing is awesome. It is very easy to install and even gives me a night light in the bathroom. I just have to remember to put the lid down after each use. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: JAMES R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Beleive me, you will appreciate this on a cold night. Any night, really.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W.

customer_reviews.title: Already “crapped” out
customer_reviews.text: Bought in February, 2019. Used for a couple of months-was great. Now it’s cold again and I went to plug it in and it won’t heat up. I had hoped it would last longer than a few short months. Hope TT makes it right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Cold
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a week, leaving the seat cold. Refund prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So upset! We have a bathroom near the garage and I was so thrilled to find this. Damn thing quit working 3 months later. Thanks for nothing!
customer_reviews.author: A cold tushie

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have no problems with the velcro or installation. We live in the mountains and the shock of using the facility at 3 AM in winter can take your breath away. The Toastie Tush solved the problem. I keep it on medium. My only comment is that the elongated version isn't quite large enough to cover the wooden seat on our toilet so there is a one inch outer ring that doesn't warm up as much. I would like a slightly larger Toastie Tush.
customer_reviews.author: Booklover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great so far. A definite benefit in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Kipka

customer_reviews.title: Giving as a gift so I hope mom likes like. We have one (round) and like it a ...
customer_reviews.text: Giving as a gift so I hope mom likes like. We have one (round) and like it a lot. easy to install and works great. It is summer now so it has not been used at any length yet,
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Our Tushies are toastie now!
customer_reviews.text: We actually LOVE this seat cover. What a difference in the middle of the night...sit down to warm!!
customer_reviews.author: SuzziQ4U

customer_reviews.title: Best purchasing decision I've made in several years.
customer_reviews.text: Got this after coming back from Japan where heated toilets are practically the norm. Greatest decision. It makes getting up in the winter sooooo much better. 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rosenstein

customer_reviews.title: Wont work on high
customer_reviews.text: doesn't work on high so doesn't get that warm.. was hoping it would work better for price I paid...Robert van hevel
customer_reviews.author: robert vanhevel

customer_reviews.title: A warm tush means a happy wife!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it, especially here in the North Country during the winter months!
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Professor

customer_reviews.title: This is GREAT! Talk about saving my butt
customer_reviews.text: This is GREAT! Talk about saving my butt! No longer do my buns have to suffer the shock of a cold toilet seat thanks to Toastie Tush!
customer_reviews.author: Malcom Black

customer_reviews.title: I can deal with 62 degrees in the house except ...
customer_reviews.text: I can deal with 62 degrees in the house except in the bathroom. I set it on low, it chill is gone from the seat. I've had it about a month with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: shopper girl

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: One of the very best purchases I have made. Easy to install, works beautifully. I have recommended this product to everyone, including postings on my Face Book page. Thank you Toastie Tush you are simply the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Kilolo653

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and works great: ) no more cold butts in my house
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and works great :) no more cold butts in my house!
customer_reviews.author: JMurillo

customer_reviews.title: Made a great and fun Christmas gift .
customer_reviews.text: I like that you do not sit right on it . Sanitary and easy to take with you if you are renting.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD L MOORE

customer_reviews.title: Great for those cold mornings.
customer_reviews.text: NO problems yet with fit, finish or operation. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Drubek

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: It works really great this is a must have if anybody wants to keep the rear in warm
customer_reviews.author: wanda black

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: Omg soooo in love !! Easy to install my bathroom is so cold and this makes my day every time I sit on it!
customer_reviews.author: jimieko newman

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: rather impossible to use/fit onto a seat and keep it there
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A.

customer_reviews.title: Best money i,ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Just buy it! Trust me when I say you need it No matter who you are. I'm so pleased I go around bragging about my heated toilet seat with zero shame!
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: did not think this was I thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: cliff king

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, works great! Should have bought this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Blinsmon

customer_reviews.title: Sent this to my niece in MT. and she loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I sent it to my niece in Montana for Christmas. She needed an extension cord, but just loves the thing. It fits right in her unheated bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Wendsong

customer_reviews.title: Heated Toilet Seat
customer_reviews.text: My 97 year old mom was always uncomfortable in the bathroom at night, complaining "It's so cold, it's so cold" over and over again, with a little quiver in her voice. You could tell how much she was suffering! Now I hear her saying, " It's hot! How nice. It's really warm now". Very easy to install and use. Definitely a worthwhile purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily removable in the summer months
customer_reviews.text: Bought for wife and she loves it. Also forces us guys to keep the lid/seat down. Simple installation. Easily removable in the summer months. The electric cord is a little unsightly if you don't have an outlet close by, but it's gotta be powered some how. For the price, and my wife's warm buns, it's a great buy. I'd purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: John Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Toastie
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted a heated toilet seat for Christmas. I looked all around and read a lot of reviews. And this was the best I could find with out spending a fortune. My husband loved it and he still loves it! It works great and ladies if you want the seat lowered for you, this is the way. You have to make sure the seat is down for it to work, I solved two problems with one gift. And the best part, I love it too. No more cold toilet seats. TOASTIE!
customer_reviews.author: John and Sandra E

customer_reviews.title: My wife just love this Toastie Tush Toilet Seat Warmer
customer_reviews.text: My wife just love this Toastie Tush Toilet Seat Warmer. For the price and ease of installation, it's a bargain. Not to mention it keeps Mommas little tush warm. LOL

customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and solves the problem of a cold toilet seat - especially for an elderly person who feels the cold.

customer_reviews.title: I never thought I'd buy this, but I don't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I live in the north and I hate a cold toilet seat more than the snow itself. This little addition has changed my winter. I don't dread going to the bathroom and with temperature settings my seat is never too warm but it no longer cold.

customer_reviews.text: Now I have to remind her to put the seat down (to keep it warm). When up the lid provides a nice warm back rest.

product_meta.title: ToastieTush (Elongated)- Innovative Toilet Seat Warmer
product_meta.description: Pattern Name:ElongatedA special heating pad that easily attaches to the underside any existing elongated toilet seat lid and warms to the comfort of the owner. There's no reason to ever be chilled on a cold toilet seat again! Leave it on all of the time for pennies a day. Allows you to lower your home thermostat and save energy without loss of comfort. Safe, Safe, Safe! UL & CSA listed. Easily wipes clean with water. Take it with you on trips. Never "go" without it. Has three settings. Great hardware for your "software". Entices the man in the house to lower the lid too! (See video on Toastie Tush or YouTube sites. Search for Toastie Tush). Once installed, can't be see when lid is down and you can still use a decorative lid cover.
feature_bullets: Special heating pad easily attaches to underside of existing toilet seat lid.
Transfers warmth to the seat when lid is closed (you do not sit on the pad).
Safe: Tested to UL & CSA standards. Has its own GFCI plug & 8 ft cord.
3 warmth settings. Only 14 to 28 watts power usage.
